content.rendered:
Directed by Bharathan.

Written by Mayank Jain.

Cast Joseph Vijay(Bhairava). Keerthy Suresh(Malarvizhi). Jagapathi Babu(Periyakannu / PK). Daniel Balaji(Kottai Veeran). Thambi Ramaiah(Narayanan (as Thambi Ramayya)). Sathish(Shanmugam). Mime Gopi(Karuvadu Kumar). Aadukalam Naren(Malar’s father (as Naren)). Sija Rose(Poongodi, Malar’s sister). Harish Uthaman(Prabha, Malar’s brother-in-law). Aparna Vinod(Vaishali). Papri Ghosh(Shailaja Venkatesan). Sriman(PK’s assistant). Sharath Lohitashwa(Union Minister). Roshan Basheer(Charan). Motta Rajendran(M. Rajendran). Y.G. Mahendran(R. Venkatesan). Vijayaraghavan(Vaishali’s Father). Seema G. Nair(Vaishali’s Mother). G. Marimuthu(Pandurangan). Malavika Avinash(Judge). Charles Vinoth(MLA). Shanmugarajan(PK’s advocate (as Shanmugha Rajan)). Sugunthan(PK’s henchman). Vishalini(Kottai Veeran’s wife). Vittal Rao(Malar’s grandfather). Subhashini(Malar’s friend). Baby Monika Siva(Poongodi’s daughter). Thavasi Raj(PK’s henchman). Rajie Vijay Sarathi(Mrs. Venkatesh). Ammu Abhirami(College Student (as Abhirami)). Ananya(College Student). Santhosh(College Student). Vaishali(Kottai Veeran’s victim). J. Osthi Ram(Kumar’s henchman). Besant Ravi(Special appearance). Thangamani Prabhu(Medical College Investigation Officer). Dinesh(Special appearance in song ‘Pattaya Kelappu’) .Abdullahil Baki

Language Tamil.

Producers Narravula Gopi Krishna. Manu Kumaran. B. Bharathi Reddy.

Production Vijaya Productions Pvt. Ltd. Goldmines Telefilms.
